name: routing
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool maptoolkit.
Tool description: A toolkit for maps: Map tiles, address search (geocoding), routing, static maps & elevation
API description: Calculates a route based on specified waypoints and options using the Map Toolkit API.

points.description:
Value: `{lat},{lng}[|{lat},{lng} ...]`
Define multiple routing waypoints, consisting of latitude and longitude. At least 2 points are needed.

finish_instruction.description: Adds a finish instruction at the end of the route. Default is None.

language.description: Language for the given instructions. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. Default value is `en`.

voice_instructions.description: Enables voice instructions for text-to-speech engines. Default is None.

filename.description: The name of the file if the output `format` is `gpx` or `kml`. Default is None.

format.description: The format of the output. Default is `json`.

weighting.description: Only available if the set `routeType` is `bike`. Default value is `networks`.

routetype.description: The type of route to calculate. Default is `bike`.
